item.title: Police Searching for Gunman After Shooting in Central Ohio Kills 1
item.description: Five others were injured in New Albany, and the police were working to apprehend the shooter, who they said did not pose a threat to the public.

item.title: What We Know About the Mass Shooting in Sweden
item.description: The authorities said that at least 11 people were killed and that the suspect was believed to be among the dead.

item.title: U.S. Trade Deficit Hit Record in 2024 as Imports Surged
item.description: A strong dollar helped drive an uptick in U.S. imports last year, while export growth remained modest.

item.title: Buffalo Bills Fans Have It Tough, Especially in Antarctica
